# FSel&dollar;
<!--
@name: FSel&dollar;
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/amos_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AMOS Pro" title="AMOS Pro" /><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/stos_logo.png" valign="center" alt="STOS Basic" title="STOS Basic" /></div>

Open a file selector and return the name of the selected file
## Parameters

- **path&dollar;**: Path to the directory to display at start
- _default&dollar;_ (optional): Name of the default file to display as selected
- _title1&dollar;_ (optional): String to display as title of the selector
- _title2&dollar;_ (optional): String to display as secondary title of the selector
- _type&dollar;_ (optional): If "load", will display a LOAD file selector, if "Save" will display a SAVE file selector
---
